Plot: A sequel to Music High, Fearless is a teenage beach bathing suit Musical-Comedy, filled with plenty of gorgeous gals and guys on the beach re-imagined from movies of the past Beach Party (1963) and Bikini Beach (1964) and Blue Crush (2002).
Title: Fearless
Writer: Mark Maine (story and screenplay), Mike Terrell (story and screenplay)
Actors: Michael Copon, John Patrick Jordan, Nikki SooHoo, Hayley Hasselhoff
